short_summary: 4 Port Secure KVM Switch for Department of Justice
description: JUSTICE DEPARTMENT HAS A REQUIREMENT FOR 4 PORT KVM THAT MEETS SECURITY REQUIREMENTS.=is need for 4 secure KVM that provides connectivity from two, four, eight or sixteen ports that meet 3 led, warning tones/log warning, packet analysis, user auth, POE inline or tipped. details in RFP.
duration_in_months: Well, you've done it. No, we did not edit the suggested case and aliases as you requested. here we go............
